The library uses *[http://log4cplus.sourceforge.net log4cplus]* for run-time logging. A client, uses the library, is responsible for one-step configuration of the library's logger before calling any library function by following statement:

{{{
#include <bdb.h>

#include <log4cplus/logger.h>
#include <log4cplus/configurator.h>

int main ()
{
    log4cplus::BasicConfigurator::doConfigure();
    // ...
    return 0;
}
}}}

Also a client can change the logging level at run-time, for example:

{{{
   log4cplus::Logger::getInstance(BDB_LOGGER_PORT).setLogLevel(log4cplus::DEBUG_LOG_LEVEL);
}}}

The list of all possible levels is available in the *log4cplus* documentation.
